original_text: But the Israelites still did not turn away from the sins that Jeroboam and his family had done. Jeroboam had caused the Israelites to do bad things, and they still continued to do them. There were still Asherah poles that people worshipped in Samaria.
korean_text: 그들이 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 한 여로보암 집의 죄에서 떠나지 아니하고 그 안에서 따라 행하며 또 사마리아에 아세라 목상을 그냥 두었더라

sentences.original_text: But the Israelites still did not turn away from the sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이스라엘 사람들은 여전히 죄에서 돌아서지 않았다

sentences.original_text: that Jeroboam and his family had done
Jeroboam had caused the Israelites to do bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 여로보암은 이스라엘 사람들이 나쁜 일을 하게 만들었었다

sentences.original_text: and they still continued to do them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 여전히 그 일들을 계속했다
